items.title: Home Advantage
items.signal: Teams playing at home win 60% of their matches.
items.whyItMatters: Home teams benefit from familiar conditions and fan support.

items.title: Late Goals
items.signal: Over 30% of goals are scored in the last 15 minutes of matches.
items.whyItMatters: Late-game scenarios can alter match outcomes dramatically.

items.title: Draw Probability
items.signal: Matches between evenly matched teams have a 25% chance of ending in a draw.
items.whyItMatters: Understanding draw probabilities helps in betting strategies.

items.title: Goalkeeper Saves
items.signal: Top goalkeepers save 75% of shots on target.
items.whyItMatters: A strong goalkeeper can significantly influence match results.

items.title: Injury Impact
items.signal: Teams missing key players due to injury lose 20% more matches.
items.whyItMatters: Injuries can drastically affect team performance and outcomes.

items.title: Red Card Effect
items.signal: Teams receiving a red card lose 70% of the time.
items.whyItMatters: Playing with a man down severely hampers a team’s chances of winning.

items.title: Scoring First
items.signal: Teams that score first win 65% of their matches.
items.whyItMatters: Early goals can set the tone for the rest of the match.

items.title: Overtime Goals
items.signal: Games going into overtime see an additional 15% of goals scored.
items.whyItMatters: Overtime can change the dynamics and final score of a game.

items.title: Defensive Teams
items.signal: Teams with a strong defensive record concede less than 1 goal per game.
items.whyItMatters: Solid defense is crucial for maintaining a competitive edge.

items.title: Fatigue Factor
items.signal: Teams playing three matches in a week win only 30% of the time.
items.whyItMatters: Fatigue can lead to diminished performance and increased errors.

items.title: Home Crowd Influence
items.signal: Home teams with large crowds win 75% of their matches.
items.whyItMatters: Crowd support can boost player morale and performance.

items.title: Weather Conditions
items.signal: Rainy weather reduces scoring by 20% on average.
items.whyItMatters: Weather can impact player performance and game strategies.

items.title: Young Talent
items.signal: Teams with players under 23 years old score 15% more goals.
items.whyItMatters: Younger players often bring energy and creativity to the game.

items.title: Substitutions Impact
items.signal: Effective substitutions lead to a 10% increase in scoring chances.
items.whyItMatters: Strategic changes can revitalize a team’s performance.

items.title: Penalty Success Rate
items.signal: Teams convert 80% of penalties successfully.
items.whyItMatters: Understanding penalty success can influence match outcomes.

items.title: Managerial Changes
items.signal: Teams experiencing a managerial change win 50% of their subsequent matches.
items.whyItMatters: A new manager can re-energize a team with fresh tactics.

items.title: Formations Matter
items.signal: Teams using a 4-3-3 formation have a 60% win rate.
items.whyItMatters: Certain formations can optimize team strengths and exploit weaknesses.

items.title: Matchday Pressure
items.signal: Players under high-pressure situations miss 25% more shots.
items.whyItMatters: Understanding pressure factors can inform player management.

items.title: Counter-Attack Success
items.signal: Teams that utilize counter-attacks score 30% of their goals from this strategy.
items.whyItMatters: Counter-attacking can effectively exploit defensive weaknesses.

items.title: Fan Engagement
items.signal: High fan engagement correlates with a 20% increase in home team performance.
items.whyItMatters: Active fan support can enhance team morale and influence match outcomes.
